Description: Limestone ostracon, a letter (?), with traces of a red scrawl, perhaps Coptic text, on both sides.
Curator's comments: Currently under study by T. Vorderstrasse with a view to publication (2018).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393086) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393086)
